title: Kanye’s antisemitic tweet could be a preview of social media’s future
description: Taking down Ye's bigoted posts was an easy call for Twitter and Instagram. That could change if Elon Musk and some GOP leaders have their way.

title: ‘PGA Tour 2K23’ features Tiger Woods, lacks memorable courses
description: No Augusta. No Pebble Beach. No St. Andrews. "PGA Tour 2K23" is a good game, but it doesn’t feel particularly distinguished.

title: Parental Tech Support: Everything you should fix on a senior’s phone
description: Clean up and optimize your parent’s smartphone with 20 minutes and this checklist.
